extendedThinking.title: Extended Thinking
extendedThinking.description: Enable deeper reasoning with more thinking tokens (uses more credits).

aiQuestionTimeout.title: AI Question Timeout
aiQuestionTimeout.description: How long to wait for your response when AI asks a question

defaultMode.title: Default Mode
defaultMode.description: Mode for new agents (Plan = read-only, Agent = can edit)

coAuthored.title: Include Co-Authored-By
coAuthored.description: Add "Co-authored-by: Claude" to git commits made by Claude

desktop.title: Desktop Notifications
desktop.description: Show system notifications when agent needs input or completes work

sound.title: Sound Notifications
sound.description: Play a sound when agent completes work while you're away

autoAdvance.title: Auto-advance
autoAdvance.description: Where to go after archiving a workspace

analytics.title: Share Usage Analytics
analytics.description: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data. We only track feature usage and app performance–never your code, prompts, or messages.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the interface

theme.title: Interface theme
theme.description: Select or customize your interface color scheme

light.title: Light
light.description: Theme to use for light system appearance

dark.title: Dark
dark.description: Theme to use for dark system appearance

workspaceIcon.title: Workspace icon
workspaceIcon.description: Show project icon in the sidebar workspace list

expandTodo.title: Always expand to-do list
expandTodo.description: Show the full to-do list instead of compact view

models.title: Models
models.description: Choose how to connect to Claude

autoOffline.title: Auto Offline Mode
autoOffline.description: Automatically use Ollama when internet is unavailable

setupInstructions.title: To enable offline mode:

custom.title: Custom API
custom.description: Use a custom API endpoint with your own credentials

usage.title: Usage Statistics
usage.description: Track your token usage and estimated costs

openaiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiKey.description: Required for voice transcription (Whisper API). Free users need their own key.

skills.title: Skills
skills.selectToView: Select a skill to view details

detail.requiresLoginNotice: This MCP server requires authentication. Please sign in to your account to access it.

runtime.title: Runtime Settings
runtime.description: Configure runtime environments for running and debugging scripts

commonTools.title: Common Tools
commonTools.description: CLI tools that enhance Hóng functionality
commonTools.hint: These tools improve search, file operations, and developer experience
commonTools.installNote: Note: Installation requires Homebrew on macOS, apt on Linux, or winget/Scoop on Windows. You can also copy the command and run it in your terminal.

preferredRuntime.title: Preferred Runtime
preferredRuntime.hint: Auto-detect will choose based on project configuration

packageManager.title: Package Manager
packageManager.hint: Auto-detect will choose based on the project's lock file

debug.title: Debug Settings
debug.portHint: Port used for Node.js inspector when running in debug mode (default: 9229)

python.title: Python
python.hint: Python runtime and package management tools

beta.title: Beta Features
beta.description: Enable experimental features. These may be unstable or change without notice.

rollback.title: Rollback
rollback.description: Allow rolling back to previous messages and restoring files.

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.description: Enable offline mode UI and Ollama integration.

kanban.title: Kanban Board
kanban.description: View workspaces as a Kanban board organized by status.

automations.title: Automations & Inbox
automations.description: Automate workflows with GitHub and Linear triggers, and manage inbox notifications.
automations.requiresPaid: Requires a paid plan. Upgrade to enable automations and inbox.

tasks.title: Agent Tasks
tasks.description: Enable Task instead of legacy Todo system.

offlineSettings.title: Offline Mode Settings
offlineSettings.modelHint: Select which model to use for offline mode
offlineSettings.autoOfflineHint: Automatically use Ollama when internet is unavailable
offlineSettings.setupStep3: Ollama will run automatically in the background

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: Check for new versions manually (bypasses CDN cache)

earlyAccess.title: Early Access
earlyAccess.description: Receive beta versions before they're released to everyone. Beta versions may be less stable.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your account and personalization settings

account.title: Account

preferences.label: Personal preferences

preferences.placeholder: e.g., I prefer concise explanations with code examples. I find analogies helpful when learning new concepts.
